title: How to Stay Cool Using the 'Ice to Wrist' Method

text: Get out the things you will need. (See 'Things You'll Need'). Layer all paper towels on top of one another. This is to absorb the melting ice. Set both ice cubes on the paper towels about 3–5 inches (8–10 cm) (80 mm to 130 mm) away from each other.  Stick your arms straight out.  Place each wrist on one ice cube.  Keep there for 1 minute or until you are cold.  Take off your wrists.  Repeat step 5-6 once more.  Enjoy the cold!
